title: Online XX Century Graphic Design Archive
content:
Hi there, I would like to share the link to the online version of the "Centro di Documentazione sul Progetto Grafico" by AIAP, Italy's main graphic design association. It features a saucerful of stuff - from book covers to type specimens - from some of the greatest XX century graphic designers and type/graphic industries and agency (click on the links on the left to browse the single collections):

[http://www.aiap.it/cdpg?IDsubarea=169](http://web.archive.org/web/20140719002458/http:/www.aiap.it/cdpg?IDsubarea=169 "http://www.aiap.it/cdpg?IDsubarea=169")

The real archive is located in Milan and can be visited on request.
author: nicolacaleffi
